scripts.compile: yarn clean && jest && lerna run compile
scripts.publish:beta: yarn compile && lerna publish prerelease --exact --preid beta --force-publish
scripts.publish:rc: yarn compile && lerna publish prerelease --exact --preid rc --force-publish
scripts.publish:canary: lerna run compile && lerna publish prerelease --exact --canary --preid canary --force-publish --yes
scripts.publish:dev: lerna run compile && lerna publish prerelease --exact --canary --preid rc0 --force-publish --yes
scripts.publish:prod: yarn compile && lerna publish && yarn clean
